title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Collaborative Learning-Based Fundamental Anatomy Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Human Anatomy and Fundamental Knowledge of Medical Terminology
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Over 85% of learners can accurately explain core terminology related to liver structure and function.
Through team projects, anatomical features of the liver can be recreated using 3D modeling.
Reflective reports combining peer and self-assessment can be produced through collaborative learning activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
